import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { Play } from './Alies' import {BallTeam,OorK,PlayType,Passer,Runner,Result,Tackler,GainYards,Reciever,PassIsComplete,Kicker,KickIsGood,KickResult,Punter,ReturnYards, TOReturnYards, KickDistance,PuntDistance,Interception, Returner} from './components/EntryPoint' type Props = { visible:boolean setVisible: React.Dispatch> } const Index:React.FC = ({visible,setVisible}) => { if(visible){return null} const { register ,handleSubmit,watch } = useForm(); const [id,setId] = useState(1); const [ballOn,setBallOn]=useState(35); const [ballPossession,setBallPossession]=useState(true); const [ballPlace,setBallPlace]=useState(true); const [homePoints,setHomePoints] = useState(0); const [awayPoints,setAwayPoints] = useState(0); const [down,setDown] = useState(1); const [distance,setDistance] = useState(10); return (
